traits.name: Brave Devotion
traits.desc: Wiggan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Wiggan is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, mending, shillelagh, thaumaturgy * 1st Level (4 slots): animal friendship, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds, speak with animals * 2nd Level (3 slots): barkskin, spike growth, spiritual weapon

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Wiggan makes two attacks with his wooden cane.

actions.name: Wooden Cane
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4-1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.
